projects.name: Marathi Text Summarizer Website
projects.description: A compatible tool that automatically summarizes long Marathi texts while preserving meaning. Integrated keyword extraction and highlighting. PDF for user-friendly sharing and archival. Laid groundwork for future accessibility features such as Text-to-Speech (TTS).

projects.name: Term Sheet Validation System
projects.description: Automated validation of financial term sheets using OCR. Extracted and validated clauses against regulatory rules. Excel reports with compliance highlights. Hackathon Project - Barclays Hack-O-Hire 2024.
